articles.title: Amazon’s Project Kuiper satellites add to astronomers’ light-pollution woes - Ars Technica
articles.description: Large constellations of satellites interfere with telescope observations, and Amazon will eventually add another 3,200 of them to the night sky. Scientists are concerned and searching for solutions.
articles.content: Representatives from SpaceX did not respond to WIREDs requests for comment. But Patricia Cooper, a former SpaceX vice president, told WIRED: SpaceX has put a lot of money, a lot of time, and a lot of… [+2874 chars]

articles.title: Huge US government borrowing adds to bond market pain - Financial Times
articles.description: Big increase in issuance and stagnant demand has exacerbated drop in Treasury bond prices, say analysts
articles.content:
A step-up in borrowing by the US government has deepened a decline in bond markets that has sent yields to their highest point since 2007, analysts and investors say.
